Suite/Test/Step Name: Test Cases/COOLMATE-004/TC001-Add product to cart the product page

Description: Go to Coolmate website and authenticate
===============Add products from the product page to cart and verify added products in cart===============
Scroll to the product
Collect the first selected product infomation that will be added to cart
Add first product to cart
Collect the second selected product infomation that will be added to cart
Collect the second selected product infomation that will be added to cart
Add second product to cart
Go to cart
Verify added first product in cart
Verify added second product in cart
Remove all products in cart
Logout and close browser

Suite/Test/Step Name: Test Cases/COOLMATE-004/TC002-Add product to cart the product detail page

Description: Go to Coolmate website and authenticate
Scroll to the product
Collect the first selected product infomation that will be added to cart
Add first product to cart

Suite/Test/Step Name: "============Go to the product detail page to add product to cart of the same color and size that was previously added and verify added product information in cart=========="

Description: Go to product detail page
Check if the product in product detail page is previously added product
Add product to cart of the same color and size that was previously added
Handle toast message after adding product to cart
Take screenshot
Go to cart
Verify added product information in cart
Verify total quantity of added product
Remove all products from cart
Logout and close browser

Collect the first option that will be added to cart
Add first product to cart
Collect the second option that will be added to cart
Collect the second option that will be added to cart
Add second product to cart
Go to cart
Verify the product that selected with first option is added in cart
Verify the product that selected with second option is added in cart
Remove all products in cart
Logout and close browser
